body:
<!-- **Are you in the right place?**
1. For issues or feature requests, please create an issue in this repository.
2. For general technical and non-technical questions, we are happy to help you on our [Rook.io Slack](https://slack.rook.io/).
3. Did you already search the existing open issues for anything similar? -->

**Is this a bug report or feature request?**
* Bug Report

**Deviation from expected behavior:**
The CI is frequently, but intermittently, failing during the kubeadm setup step, even before any of the rook integration tests run.

```
The connection to the server localhost:8080 was refused - did you specify the right host or port?
The connection to the server localhost:8080 was refused - did you specify the right host or port?
error: unable to recognize "https://cloud.weave.works/k8s/net?k8s-": Get http://localhost:8080/api?timeout=32s: dial tcp 127.0.0.1:8080: connect: connection refused
wait for K8s master node to be Ready
The connection to the server localhost:8080 was refused - did you specify the right host or port?
.
The connection to the server localhost:8080 was refused - did you specify the right host or port?
.
```

For example, see [this build](https://jenkins.rook.io/blue/rest/organizations/jenkins/pipelines/rook/pipelines/rook/branches/PR-5708/runs/2/nodes/59/steps/132/log/?start=0). It seems independent of the version of K8s being installed.

**Expected behavior:**
CI should successfully and reliably setup k8s.
title: CI is failing frequently to setup K8s before Rook integration tests are run on K8s 1.11
